__e: But once you calm down, you'll see that it's just the two of us.
Okay, well, then she needs to understand that it can't all be about what she wants.
If He sees what I see, He sees that it is good.
But then he'd realize he doesn't have to deal with all this.
It's only natural that you think that you are somehow being conned, but think a little harder, and you will realize that this is not a trick.
You must understand... that after what happened, we cannot be friends again.
When the war is over, he will realise his mistake and come back for me.
We'd peek at the girls in the shower, and I'd look at all of them, no matter what color they were.
But sometimes you screw up. You have to go away and get sorted and then come home again.
